mapper.select: SELECT A.NAME, A.EMAIL, B.DETAIL_CODE_NAME AS DEPARTMENT_NAME, ( SELECT DETAIL_CODE_NAME FROM TB_COMMON_CODE_DETAIL C WHERE C.DETAIL_CODE = A.POSITION ) AS POSITION_NAME, A.ESNTL_ID FROM TB_MEMBER A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_COMMON_CODE_DETAIL B ON B.DETAIL_CODE = A.DEPARTMENT LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PROJECT_USER C ON C.ESNTL_ID = A.ESNTL_ID WHERE A.QUIT_AT = 'N' AND A.EMAIL != #{email} AND C.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} ORDER BY A.NAME
